name: Dilemma At River Crossing
description:
The "Wolf, Goat Cabbage" puzzle is centuries old - old enough that Wikipedia has an extensive page on it. 

As part of teaching myself the game-engine Twine this week I decided to see if I could make a game of it in one day, with graphics.

Very very simple graphics.

This is the result...

It is a very short game! It's literally just the one very well known puzzle.
